frontmatter.announcement: Announcing EIP-712 support! See our mobile and library release notes https://developer.uport.me/releases for details.

node.name: Version 1.1.8
node.description: - Upgraded uport-transports to include Chasqui URL fix

node.name: Version 1.1.7
node.description: - Upgraded several dependencies to support Infura URLs that require a PROJECT ID

node.name: Version 1.1.6
node.description: - Upgraded several dependencies to support Infura URLs that require a PROJECT ID

node.name: Version 1.1.5
node.description: - Upgrade `uport-transports` to use Infura URLs with API key

node.name: Production Release
node.description:
-  Demo Text removed from the home screen
-  Camera scanner upgraded to improve experience
-  Status Bar is now displayed on main screen
-  Continue button is enabled after recovery is complete
- Account Balance is now refreshed on transaction and disclosure screen

node.name: v423- Production Release
node.description:
- Improved Onboarding experience
- Name is now required when creating a new identity
- Scan button needs to be tapped before QR code can be scanned
- Menu is now collapsed at the bottom of the home screen
- Profile and Accounts Information are now accessed via the person icon
- Contacts are now accessed via the people icon
- Verifications are now accessed via the check icon
- Settings are now be accessed via the gear icon
